title: Infrastructure Discovery and Dependency Mapping
description: Comprehensive assessment of TargetCo infrastructure including server inventory, network topology, storage platforms, application dependencies, and integration points with ParentCo systems
dependencies: Technical interviews with ParentCo IT team

title: Azure AD Tenant Separation and User Migration
description: Migrate 650 TargetCo users from ParentCo Azure AD tenant to BuyerCo tenant, including user accounts, group memberships, application registrations, and authentication policies

title: Server Infrastructure Migration
description: Migrate 110-130 servers from ParentCo environment to BuyerCo infrastructure, including OS updates, application testing, and cutover coordination

title: Network Infrastructure Separation
description: Establish independent network infrastructure for TargetCo including firewall configuration, VPN setup, network segmentation, and connectivity to BuyerCo network

title: Device Management Integration
description: Migrate 620 devices from ParentCo Intune to BuyerCo device management, including policy migration, certificate updates, and application deployment

title: TSA Infrastructure Services Setup
description: Establish Transition Service Agreements for critical infrastructure services including identity, security monitoring, network connectivity, and application hosting during separation period

title: Network Discovery and Documentation
description: Conduct comprehensive discovery of TargetCo's current network infrastructure within ParentCo environment including topology mapping, IP addressing schemes, DHCP/DNS configuration, firewall rules, and site connectivity

title: IP Address Conflict Analysis and Resolution Planning
description: Analyze IP addressing schemes between TargetCo (via ParentCo) and BuyerCo networks to identify conflicts and develop renumbering plan if needed. Include DHCP scope analysis and DNS zone conflicts

title: Day 1 Connectivity Solution Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement temporary network connectivity solution to ensure TargetCo maintains business operations on Day 1 of separation from ParentCo. May include site-to-site VPNs, temporary circuits, or hybrid connectivity

title: Network Security Migration and Firewall Configuration
description: Migrate network security controls from ParentCo-managed environment to BuyerCo network including firewall rule migration, security zone configuration, and VPN setup. Ensure security posture is maintained during transition

title: Permanent WAN Connectivity Implementation
description: Design and implement permanent WAN connectivity solution for TargetCo sites to integrate with BuyerCo network. May include MPLS extension, SD-WAN deployment, or new dedicated circuits based on requirements

title: Comprehensive Security Assessment
description: Conduct thorough security assessment of TargetCo's current security posture including vulnerability assessment, penetration testing, and security control evaluation

title: Identity and Access Management Migration
description: Migrate 650 users from ParentCo Azure AD to BuyerCo Azure AD including user accounts, groups, MFA settings, and application integrations

title: Security Operations Center (SOC) Establishment
description: Establish independent security monitoring capability including SIEM deployment, log source configuration, detection rule creation, and SOC staffing or MSSP engagement

title: Endpoint Security Migration
description: Migrate 620 endpoints from ParentCo CrowdStrike instance to BuyerCo security management including agent reconfiguration and policy alignment

title: Privileged Access Management Implementation
description: Implement PAM solution for 25-40 privileged accounts including account vaulting, session recording, and access workflow management

title: Compliance Certification Establishment
description: Establish independent SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certifications including control implementation, documentation, and audit preparation

title: Incident Response Capability Development
description: Develop independent incident response capability including IR plan creation, team training, forensic capability, and legal counsel engagement

title: Integration Program Management Office (PMO) Establishment
description: Establish dedicated PMO to manage complex cross-domain dependencies, timeline coordination, and stakeholder communication across 18-24 month integration

title: Comprehensive TSA Negotiation and Management
description: Negotiate and manage extended TSA covering all shared services (Azure AD, network, security, ERP/CRM/HCM) with clear SLAs and exit criteria
